m_szDocSumamry: Mercedes GLC 350 e 4MATIC Plug-In SUV Unveiled Originally published on EV Obsession . Another new electric vehicle (EV) offering from the German automaker Mercedes-Benz was recently unveiled, following the recent GLE 550 e plug-in SUV reveal. In this latest case, the company showed off the new GLC 350 e 4MATIC plug-in hybrid SUV. The new PHEV is part of the new second generation of the mid-range GLC SUV platform, and features improved fuel efficiency owing to improved drive systems, reduced weight, etc — amongst other things.
